item.title: CLI Tools
item.description: Tools I use on command line. I love exploring cli tools that saves my time on cli and more importantly prints the stuff with syntax highlightling or good visualizations. Here are a bunch of which i use: dust Dust gives an instant overview of disk space used by directories. Github. duf Shows Disk Usage/Free Utility in a nice table format. Github. bat It’s a clone of `cat` with syntax highlighting support for a ton of languages.
